title: Need "Latin" (triangle serif in the vein of Matrix) with Intl. Characters!
content:
Hello,

I’m looking for a Latin type family like Bitstream’s Latin 725, but I need  
Greek, cyrillic, eastern european and turkish charachter sets. Can anyone  
recommend something? It’s for a corp. ID program which is in transition.  
We use Matrix Book for body copy but there are no non-Western characters  
in it to use in international materials.

thanks in advance,

Enrico
author: enrico_limcaco

comments.content:
Assuming you have the time, why not get permission (via $) from Emigre to extend Matrix\* as needed? Then find a friendly type designer to carry it out.

\* And while you’re at it you could fix the “g” too:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/14378](http://web.archive.org/web/20060503200601/http:/typophile.com/node/14378)

hhp

that nubbin in the second story of the g is a little funny I’ll admit. but we need a complementary face really really soon, tomorrow actually.

But hey, that sounds like a cool way to make money during the holidays  
that don’t involve customer service or wearing a paper hat.

:0)
